name: Spec11 Report Generation
description: An Apache Beam batch pipeline that reads from a Datastore export and generate Spec11 report for the month, saving it to both SQL and as a JSON file on GCS.

parameters.name: isolationOverride
parameters.label: The desired SQL transaction isolation level.
parameters.helpText: The desired SQL transaction isolation level.

parameters.name: sqlWriteBatchSize
parameters.label: SQL write batch size.
parameters.helpText: The number of entities to write to the SQL database in one operation.

parameters.name: date
parameters.label: The date when the pipeline runs
parameters.helpText: The date when the threat scan is performed, in yyyy-MM-dd format.

parameters.name: safeBrowsingApiKey
parameters.label: API Key used to identify the project with Safe Browsing
parameters.helpText: API key used to authenticate the project with the SafeBrowsing API.

parameters.name: reportingBucketUrl
parameters.label: Spec11 report upload dir.
parameters.helpText: The root directory of the report to upload.
